Uses of Class
org.bukkit.GameRule

Packages that use GameRule 
Package Description
org.bukkit
The root package of the Bukkit API, contains generalized API classes.

  • Uses of GameRule in org.bukkit

    Fields in org.bukkit declared as GameRule 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.ANNOUNCE_ADVANCEMENTS
    Toggles the announcing of advancements.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.COMMAND_BLOCK_OUTPUT
    Whether command blocks should notify admins when they perform commands.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DISABLE_ELYTRA_MOVEMENT_CHECK
    Whether the server should skip checking player speed when the player is wearing elytra.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DISABLE_RAIDS
    Whether pillager raids are enabled or not.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_DAYLIGHT_CYCLE
    Whether time progresses from the current moment.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_ENTITY_DROPS
    Whether entities that are not mobs should have drops.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_FIRE_TICK
    Whether fire should spread and naturally extinguish.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_IMMEDIATE_RESPAWN
    Whether clients will respawn immediately after death or not.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_INSOMNIA
    Whether phantoms will appear without sleeping or not.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_LIMITED_CRAFTING
    Whether players should only be able to craft recipes they've unlocked first.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_MOB_LOOT
    Whether mobs should drop items.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_MOB_SPAWNING
    Whether mobs should naturally spawn.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_PATROL_SPAWNING
    Whether patrols should naturally spawn.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_TILE_DROPS
    Whether blocks should have drops.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_TRADER_SPAWNING
    Whether traders should naturally spawn.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DO_WEATHER_CYCLE
    Whether the weather will change from the current moment.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.DROWNING_DAMAGE
    Whether drowning damage is enabled or not.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.FALL_DAMAGE
    Whether fall damage is enabled or not.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.FIRE_DAMAGE
    Whether fire damage is enabled or not.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.FORGIVE_DEAD_PLAYERS
    Whether mobs should cease being angry at a player once they die.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.KEEP_INVENTORY
    Whether the player should keep items in their inventory after death.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.LOG_ADMIN_COMMANDS
    Whether to log admin commands to server log.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Integer> GameRule.MAX_COMMAND_CHAIN_LENGTH
    Determines the number at which the chain of command blocks act as a "chain."
    This is the maximum amount of command blocks that can be activated in a single tick from a single chain.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Integer> GameRule.MAX_ENTITY_CRAMMING
    The maximum number of other pushable entities a mob or player can push, before taking suffocation damage.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.MOB_GRIEFING
    Whether mobs can pick up items or change blocks.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.NATURAL_REGENERATION
    Whether players can regenerate health naturally through their hunger bar.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Integer> GameRule.RANDOM_TICK_SPEED
    How often a random block tick occurs (such as plant growth, leaf decay, etc.) per chunk section per game tick.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.REDUCED_DEBUG_INFO
    Whether the debug screen shows all or reduced information.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.SEND_COMMAND_FEEDBACK
    Whether the feedback from commands executed by a player should show up in chat.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.SHOW_DEATH_MESSAGES
    Whether a message appears in chat when a player dies.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Integer> GameRule.SPAWN_RADIUS
    The number of blocks outward from the world spawn coordinates that a player will spawn in when first joining a server or when dying without a spawnpoint.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.SPECTATORS_GENERATE_CHUNKS
    Whether players in spectator mode can generate chunks.
    static GameRule<java.lang.Boolean> GameRule.UNIVERSAL_ANGER
    Whether mobs will target all player entities once angered.
